workshoptitle: Building with Vector Search and Embeddings

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Overview of vector search, embeddings, and the CityPulse dataset

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Connect & Explore the Knowledge Base
tutorials.description: Connect to Oracle ADB and see why keyword search fails for semantic queries

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Chunk & Embed — From Text to Vectors
tutorials.description: Split documents into chunks and generate vector embeddings with ONNX

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Similarity Search & Distance Metrics
tutorials.description: Perform vector searches with cosine, dot product, and euclidean metrics

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Indexing for Performance — HNSW
tutorials.description: Create an HNSW vector index and observe the execution plan change

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Putting It Together — Simple RAG
tutorials.description: Build a RAG pipeline that retrieves context and generates grounded answers

tutorials.title: Quiz
tutorials.description: Test your knowledge of vector search, embeddings, and RAG

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to common problems and support contacts
